thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 3 of 390
thread.title: Steve D

author: Steve D
title: Steve D
text: Until I saw the Homeadvisor commercial on television I was flying blind. Going onto their site I found it to be an easy do-it-yourself step-by-step process to identify local contractors best suited for the type of work I was envisioning. Their site and resources are phenomenal and lhen, I received a Customer Service Satisfaction call from one of these folks to discuss the progress of my request, to ascertain the responses received to date and to give me an actual name and contact locally from Homeadvisor to assist me should I need additional information. This was one call which I welcomed and which I am still grateful for receiving. I LOVE HOMEADVISOR.com!!!!
